sitematrix-summary: Text for the Wikimedia sites special page "Special:SiteMatrix"
sitematrix-total: Parameters: * $1 - number of databases (count of the array $wgLocalDatabases)
sitematrix-closed: Comment for wikis with no write access, but full read access
sitematrix-private: Comment for wikis where read and write access are restricted
sitematrix-fishbowl: Comment for wikis where only some approved users are allowed to edit the wiki
sitematrix-nonglobal: Comment for public wikis where registration is required
